intro.title: Tell us about your property
intro.subtitle: Let's start with the main characteristics.
intro.description: In this first part, we will define the type of property, its location, its surface area, and technical characteristics.

category.title: Which of these best describes your property?
category.subtitle: Choose a category

surface.title: What is the surface area?
surface.subtitle: Indicate the living area in m¬≤

info.title: How many rooms?
info.subtitle: Detail the configuration of your property
info.subtitleRoom: Tell us more about this room
info.linkRoomHint: Select a room created when adding the property to automatically retrieve its photos.

details.title: Additional details
details.subtitle: Specify the floor and accessibility
details.kitchen: Does your property have a separate kitchen?

energy.title: Energy Performance
energy.subtitle: Indicate DPE, GES, and energy details.

introAssets.title: Highlight your property
introAssets.subtitle: Add amenities, photos, and a detailed description.
introAssets.description: It‚Äôs time to attract tenants! List your property's assets and add beautiful photos.

images.title: Add photos of your property
images.subtitle: Add at least 4 photos. You can always add more later.

description.title: How would you describe your property?
description.subtitle: Choose an adjective that fits best

introRental.title: Finalize your listing
introRental.subtitle: Define the rental type and price.
introRental.description: Last step! Choose the contract type (Bare, Furnished, Colocation) and set the rent.

rentalType.title: What type of rental do you offer?
rentalType.subtitle: This will determine the lease type.

bare.title: Bare Rental
bare.desc: Empty property rented as a primary residence.

colocation.title: Colocation
colocation.desc: Rent multiple rooms in the same property.

rentControl.title: Rent Control
rentControl.illegalDesc: The rent exceeds the estimated ceiling of {amount} ‚Ç¨. This may be illegal.
rentControl.compliantDesc: This rent is below the legal ceiling.

intro.title: Configure rooms
intro.subtitle: You indicated {count} rooms. Let's configure them one by one.
intro.description: For a colocation, it is important to detail each private space.

details.title: Room {number}
details.subtitle: Room characteristics.
details.hint: We advise you to describe the room's location (e.g., street side, courtyard side) and its assets (bright, quiet...).

labels.privateBathroomDesc: Is there a bathroom exclusive to this room?
labels.publishDesc: The listing will be visible to tenants.

errors.floorsRequired: Please indicate the number of floors

steps.completeDossier: Complete my tenant file with DossierFacile

landlord.helpText: A question or a problem? Contact our support team.

applicationsPage.title: My Applications
applicationsPage.subtitle: Track the progress of your rental applications.

visits.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this appointment?

finances.title: Finance & Rents
finances.subtitle: Track your collections and connect your bank

hero.title: Your rents, verified <green>automatically</green>.
hero.description: Connect your bank account to allow Coridor to detect incoming rents and update receipts in real-time.
hero.footer: SSL Encrypted ‚Ä¢ Read-only access ‚Ä¢ ACPR Authorized Partner

features.secureConnDesc: We connect your account in read-only mode. We only see amounts and labels, without ever being able to initiate transfers.
features.targetedAnalysisDesc: Our system searches only for strict matches between Tenant Name, Rent Amount, and Date.
features.simpleValidationDesc: If everything matches, the status changes to Paid. That's it. No other data is analyzed or stored.

trust.description:
Coridor uses Powens technology, a payment institution authorized by ACPR (Banque de France) under number 16928.
Your banking credentials are encrypted and never stored by Coridor.

visit.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this visit?

personalInfo.title: Personal information
personalInfo.subtitle: Manage your personal information and contact details.

profilePhoto.title: Profile photo
profilePhoto.visibility: This photo will be visible to other users.

identity.title: Identity
identity.hint: Edit your first name, last name and date of birth.

phone.hint: Add or edit your phone number.

composition.label: Who do you want to move in with?

bio.title: About you
bio.subtitle: Introduce yourself in a few words to landlords (hobbies, lifestyle...)
bio.label: Your short bio

dossierFacile.linked: Your file is linked to your Coridor profile.
dossierFacile.description: DossierFacile is the State's digital rental file. entirely free, compliant and secure, it protects tenants and reassures landlords.

rentRevision.title: Rent Revision

rentRevision.info: ‚ÑπÔ∏è This action will close the current financial period the day before the effective date and start a new one.

rentVerification.title: Financial Reliability
rentVerification.successDesc: Your payment regularity is certified. This is a major asset for your file!

measurement.description: Choose your preferred unit system for surface areas (m¬≤ vs sq ft).
